original_text: But in the 18th year that Josiah ruled Judah as king, the people once again had a Passover festival to give honour to the Lord.
korean_text: 요시야 왕 열여덟째 해에 예루살렘에서 여호와 앞에 이 유월절을 지켰더라

sentences.original_text: that Josiah ruled Judah as king
the people once again had a Passover festival
to give honour to the Lord
